history.content:
Hey all! Working on a product or service? Free Ventures, a nonprofit startup accelerator is recruiting student founders for its virtual Fall 2020 Batch! 🚀

 

Our team actively works with Greylock Partners, Pear, The House, Cooley law firm, Silicon Valley Bank and other partners to build the strongest community of Berkeley founders  —  running the full spectrum from ideation to investment. We have helped our 63 alumni teams raise over $40 million from top firms such as Y Combinator, Greylock, KPCB, and SV Angel. Collectively they’ve gone on to tackle problems in VR, drones, IoT, neuroscience, AI, real estate, and renewable energy, just to name a few.

 

Our founders — ranging from undergrads to MBAs and PhDs — receive equity-free funding, mentorship, workshops ranging from legal to product and fundraising, a community of founders to share in their journey, and much more.

 

If you are currently enrolled at UC Berkeley and working on a product or service, we encourage you to attend our infosession (https://www.facebook.com/events/989171948189932/) and apply at http://www.freeventures.org/apply/ to discover the potential of your idea. 

 

Applications are due Friday, September 11th at midnight. Feel free to reach out to myself (adhiv@freeventures.org) or Nikita Ashok (nikita@freeventures.org) if you have questions :)
history.subject: Working on a startup or side project? Free Ventures' Startup Accelerator is recruiting!
